item.title: Dad pays tribute to 'wonderful family' killed in Boxing Day fire
item.description: Tom Shearman pays tribute to his wife and two children after a fire engulfed their home.

item.title: Amber snow and ice warnings issued as Arctic air spreads across the UK
item.description: Colder weather with snow and ice warnings in force will continue over the next few days.

item.title: Annual Channel migrant crossings highest since 2022
item.description: The 2025 total is the highest since 2022, when nearly 46,000 migrants made the crossing.

item.title: Dazzling spectacles in London, Edinburgh and across the UK
item.description: Millions around the UK have attended firework displays and street parties to usher in 2026.

item.title: BBC reports from the scene of Swiss resort bar fire
item.description: The BBC's Silvia Costeloe says the bar where the fire broke out has been around for at least 40 years, and is considered an institution in the area.
